scripts.test: sequelize db:drop --env test && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test && NODE_ENV=test node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --verbose --detectOpenHandles
scripts.db:clean: sequelize db:drop && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
